channel.title: PC Portals Respawning [PI]
channel.description: Okay well I have this problem about my portals respawning after they get took down by players. My question is how do I make it so they do not respawn? Is there a guide or something I can go by? Is there a way in the npcdead method to make an exception?

item.title: PC Portals Respawning [PI]

Okay well I have this problem about my portals respawning after they get took down by players. My question is how do I make it so they do not respawn? Is there a guide or something I can go by? Is there a way in the npcdead method to make an exception?
